languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс молчит несколько секунд, глядя в пустоту. Наконец он начинает говорить.{/n} "Эмелина Иона Лихтенхарт..."
{n}Heinrix says nothing for several seconds, staring into space. At last, he begins to speak:{/n} "Emelina Iona Lichtenhart..."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс молчит несколько секунд, глядя в пустоту. Наконец он начинает говорить.{/n} "Эмелина Иона Лихтенхарт..."

languages.text: {n}海因里希一言不发，凝视着虚空。到最后，他终于开了口。{/n}“艾米莉娜·艾欧娜·莱肯哈特……”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix says nothing for several seconds, staring into space. At last, he begins to speak:{/n} "Emelina Iona Lichtenhart..."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希一言不发，凝视着虚空。到最后，他终于开了口。{/n}“艾米莉娜·艾欧娜·莱肯哈特……”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix guarda silencio durante unos segundos mientras mira al vacío. Por fin, empieza a hablar:{/n} «Emelina Iona Lichtenhart...».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix says nothing for several seconds, staring into space. At last, he begins to speak:{/n} "Emelina Iona Lichtenhart..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix guarda silencio durante unos segundos mientras mira al vacío. Por fin, empieza a hablar:{/n} «Emelina Iona Lichtenhart...».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは数秒の間何も言わず、宇宙を見つめる。しばらくして、彼は話し始めた。{/n}「エメリナ・イオナ・リヒテンハルト…」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix says nothing for several seconds, staring into space. At last, he begins to speak:{/n} "Emelina Iona Lichtenhart..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは数秒の間何も言わず、宇宙を見つめる。しばらくして、彼は話し始めた。{/n}「エメリナ・イオナ・リヒテンハルト…」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}L'interrogateur garde le silence pendant plusieurs secondes, le regard perdu dans le vide. Enfin, il ouvre la bouche :{/n} « Emelina Iona Lichtenhart... »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix says nothing for several seconds, staring into space. At last, he begins to speak:{/n} "Emelina Iona Lichtenhart..."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'interrogateur garde le silence pendant plusieurs secondes, le regard perdu dans le vide. Enfin, il ouvre la bouche :{/n} « Emelina Iona Lichtenhart... »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix schweigt einige Sekunden und starrt ins Nichts. Dann beginnt er zu sprechen:{/n} "Emelina Iona Lichtenhart ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix says nothing for several seconds, staring into space. At last, he begins to speak:{/n} "Emelina Iona Lichtenhart..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix schweigt einige Sekunden und starrt ins Nichts. Dann beginnt er zu sprechen:{/n} "Emelina Iona Lichtenhart ..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, birkaç saniye boyunca ağzını açmadan boşluğa bakıyor. Sonrasında nihayet konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Emelina İona Lichtenhart."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix says nothing for several seconds, staring into space. At last, he begins to speak:{/n} "Emelina Iona Lichtenhart..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix birkaç saniye boyunca hiçbir şey söylemeden boşluğa bakıyor. Ardından konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} "Emelina İona Lichtenhart."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
